pkgmetadata.longdescription: Solving Mixed Model Equations in R // Mixed model equation solver allowing the specification of variance covariance structures of random effects and residual structures. ML/REML estimates are obtained using the Average Information and/or Expectation- Maximization algorithms. Designed for genomic prediction and genome wide association studies (GWAS) to include additive, dominant and epistatic relationship structures or other covariance structures in R.
